title: "hey wanna swap?"  "na"  "okay then, gl team :)"
body: anyone usually trade just to avoid this situation?

replies.body: No, I'd rather they feed in my game and get banned than let them continue doing this without repercussion.
I swap if they start crying about how bad they are at that role.
i only trade when i q up as fill

I always ask what champions/positions they play. I'm more interested in a good team composition and winning the game than punishing them for getting auto filled. I don't expect a jungle/top main to be a good support, so I take the role from them so long as they can play something that provides either the tank, cc, or damage we need.
i do not negotiate with terrorists
